headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: adgroup_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the ad groups that you want to get diagnosis for. Max size: 20.

parameters.name: issue_category
parameters.description: The issue category or categories. Allowed valuesï¼š CREATIVE : creative-related issues. BID_AND_BUDGET : issues related to bids and budgets. EVENT_TRACK : issues related to event tracking. If multiple values are specified for this field, diagnoses belonging to any of the specified issue categories will be returned. If this field is not specified, diagnoses belonging to all issue categories will be returned.
